intro: Turning and grinding metal at the highest level
trust: We have been earning your trust for 7 years
about_text: A company with 7 years of experience in metal processing, specializing in turning, grinding, and welding.
service1_desc: Precision turning using our CNC and universal lathes.
service2_desc: High-quality grinding using centerless grinders and grinding machines between centers.
service3_desc: Fine welding for small projects and repairs.
